alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bergen, southern Westchester and Rockland Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1204 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tappan, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New City, Bergenfield, Paramus, Ossining, Nanuet, Haverstraw, Tarrytown, Dobbs Ferry, Nyack, Tappan, Pearl River, Oradell, Norwood, Hawthorne and Orangeburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
